subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Curlin (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: If the two racehorses remain unbeaten in 2008, Suffolk Downs is offering to sponsor a match-up in this year’s Massachusetts Handicap.
snippet: If the two racehorses remain unbeaten in 2008, Suffolk Downs is offering to sponsor a match-up in this year’s Massachusetts Handicap.
